Title: Power Rangers Megaforce: The Great Dragon Spirit

reviewText: This is the third installment for Megaforce.  The rangers learn more about Robo Knight and he finally joins up with them realizing that teamwork is better than going it alone.  The rangers also learn more about themselves and each other and how to work as a team more.  I would recommend this to anyone who likes Power Rangers, collects the seasons of Power Rangers and especially Megaforce
Title: Power Rangers Megaforce: The Great Dragon Spirit

reviewText: this is pretty good nothing to bad about this one has very good episode's to watch kid will like it
Title: Power Rangers Megaforce: The Great Dragon Spirit

reviewText: The 4 episodes you get are:Prince Takes Knight (9)Man and Machine (10)Ultra Power (11)Last Laugh (12)
